_meanings:
{@--1@} To sacrifice,
worship with sacrifices (often
with <ab>instr.</ab> of words meaning ‘a 
sacrifice’); {#yajeta rAjA kratuBiH#}  
<ls>Ms. 7. 79</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">5. 53</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">6. 36</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">11. 40</ls>; <ls>Bk. 14. 90</ls>; so
{#aSvameDeneje, pAkayajYeneje#} &c.

{@--3@} To perform the office
of the sacrificing priest.
